content: I think I'll try to slowly adjust my bedtime by 15-minute increments every few days to help my body get used to the new sleep schedule. I'll also make sure to create a relaxing bedtime routine that includes reading and journaling to help me wind down. And, of course, I'll try to stick to my new wake-up time of 6:30 am to get at least 7-8 hours of sleep. Thanks for the advice!
